SDI.description: Total revenue/sales. May include all revenue streams.
SDI.usage: Use for total revenue. Note: SI (Nettoomsättning) may be more accurate for net revenue.

SI.description: Net revenue after returns and adjustments. This is what Allabolag displays as 'Nettoomsättning' in the income statement.
SI.usage: PREFERRED for revenue display - matches Allabolag's main revenue figure.

DR.description: Net profit after all expenses and taxes.

resultat_e_avskrivningar.description: Operating result after depreciation. This is EBIT (Earnings Before Interest and Taxes). Displayed as 'Rörelseresultat efter avskrivningar' in Allabolag income statement.
resultat_e_avskrivningar.usage: PREFERRED for EBIT - matches Allabolag's EBIT figure exactly.

RG.description: Working capital (current assets - current liabilities). NOT the same as EBIT!
RG.usage: Do NOT use for EBIT. This is working capital, not operating profit.
RG.warning: RG is NOT EBIT - use resultat_e_avskrivningar for EBIT

ORS.description: Operating result before depreciation. May be EBITDA or similar operating metric.
ORS.usage: Use for EBITDA if available, but verify against EBITDA code if present.

EBITDA.description: Earnings Before Interest, Taxes, Depreciation, and Amortization.

resultat_e_finansnetto.description: Profit after financial income and expenses, before tax.

BE.description: Gross profit (revenue - cost of goods sold).

ANT.description: Employee count. NOT in thousands - actual count.
ANT.usage: Use for employee count. Do NOT multiply by 1000.
ANT.note: This is NOT in thousands - it's the actual employee count

revenue.reason: SI (Nettoomsättning) matches Allabolag's displayed revenue figure exactly

ebit.reason: resultat_e_avskrivningar is 'Rörelseresultat efter avskrivningar' which matches Allabolag's EBIT display. RG is working capital, NOT EBIT.

ebitda.reason: Use EBITDA code if available, otherwise ORS

net_profit.reason: DR is 'Årets resultat' - net profit for the year

important_notes.revenue_discrepancy: SDI (121,450) vs SI (121,329): SDI is total revenue, SI is net revenue. Use SI for display to match Allabolag.
important_notes.ebit_warning: RG (129) is NOT EBIT - it's working capital. Use resultat_e_avskrivningar (69) for EBIT.
important_notes.thousands_conversion: All financial values are in thousands of SEK in raw data. Multiply by 1000 to get actual SEK. Exception: ANT (employees) is actual count.
important_notes.currency: All values are in SEK unless currency field indicates otherwise (e.g., EUR).
